field.value: Risk: Medium (Name and Resource Group recommended)

field.value: Risk: High - (SKU = Free or Basic) Restricted for High-Threat Audiences

field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - Recommend Name Pattern when associated with VMSS

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Very High - High-Threat Audience: Restricted (Unmitigated)

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Very High (Cost >$100/day) - Under Review. Requires Teardown LCA. May not be grantable for High-threat audiences.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Very High (Cost - >$100/day) - Under Review. Requires Teardown LCA. Use with extreme caution. SKU.Tier recommended.

field.value: High Cost - Restrict where possible. Not currently assessed.

field.value: Cost: High - Restrict where possible. Not currently assessed.

field.value: Cost: BLOCKED - Use Recovery Service Vaults instead.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - High-Threat Audience: Restricted - Cost: Very High. Workspaces sku can have transient "Exists" : "False" during deployment. Denied for High-Threat audience.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low (Orphans) - May require Teardown - Cost: Potentially Very High (example: Gateways). Recommend Name and Resource Group.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low. Recommend Name and Resource Group.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Medium - Cost: High - Recommend SKU. Workspaces sku can have transient "Exists" : "False" during deployment

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low (Orphans) - Restrict as possible - Requires Teardown LCA. Easily orphaned, will incure ongoing costs if not torn down properly.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - Under Review - May require novel restrictions (SKU field not present)

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Medium (Compute) - Cost: Very High. Master DB's can have sku.name "System", sku.tier: "System", sku.capacity: 0.

field.value: Risk: Low - (Teardown LCA required) Cost: High for Hot Tiers - Recommend Name, Resource Group

field.value: Risk: Low (Orphans) - May require tear-down LCA

field.value: Risk: Very High - High-Threat Audience: Restricted (Unmitigated) - Cost: Very High

field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - Cost: Very High - Recommend Kind when Name not available (eg: function apps)
